channel.title: Comments on: The ‘Another flash debugger may be running’ error in Flex Builder 3
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Raya
item.dc:creator: Raya
item.description: That&apos;d worked just fine for me, thank you very much!
item.content:encoded: That'd worked just fine for me, thank you very much!

item.title: By: Philoo
item.dc:creator: Philoo
item.description: Great post thanks. Also, if you are running the Flex plug in from Zend Studio, just add -Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true to the ZendStudio.ini file. Adding it to the shortcut did not work for me.
item.content:encoded:
Great post thanks.
Also, if you are running the Flex plug in from Zend Studio, just add -Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true to the ZendStudio.ini file. Adding it to the shortcut did not work for me.
